title: Jesus
summary: Jesus[lower-alpha 5] (c. 4 BC –  AD 30 / 33), also referred to as Jesus of Nazareth or Jesus Christ,[lower-alpha 6] is the central figure of Christianity, the world's largest religion. He was a first-century Jewish preacher and religious leader.[11]  Christians believe he is the Son of God and the awaited messiah (the Christ), prophesied in the Hebrew Bible.
